bwwExcerpt: Truly, all you need to know about this by-the-book jukebox show, which marked its official opening Thursday at the Lunt-Fontanne Theatre, has to do with Warren's earth-moving gifts. Hers isn't so much a performance as an eruption. Blessed with extraordinary pipes, restless grace and a star's joy of center stage, Warren creates the impression of being as good a Tina Turner as, well, Tina Turner.
